item.title: 深入研究一下美国房地产市场的数据，就会发现一些有趣的现象发生在高端市场：虽然价格较低的住宅销售量大幅下降，但价格在 100 万美元以上的住宅销售量却同比增长了近 30%。
item.description:
Drill down into US housing market data a little bit, and something interesting is happening at the top end: while sales of cheaper homes are way down, sales of homes priced above $1mn are up nearly 30% year on year https://t.co/ySgYitK9ML

— Financial Times (@FT) March 17, 2024
